trans-unit.source: Represents an area within a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel"></xref> control that represents a hyperlink within the control.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma área dentro de uma <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel"> </xref> controle que representa um hiperlink dentro do controle.

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to add a hyperlink to the text of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> control.
trans-unit.target: Há duas maneiras de adicionar um hiperlink ao texto de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>

trans-unit.source: You can access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection> class through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Links%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> to add multiple hyperlinks to the control's text.
trans-unit.target: Você pode acessar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A>método do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>classe por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Links%2A>propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>para adicionar vários hiperlinks para o texto do controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Links%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you only need to add a single hyperlink to the text of the control, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>.
trans-unit.target: Se você precisar adicionar um hiperlink único para o texto do controle, você pode usar a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property accepts a LinkArea that defines the location of the hyperlink within the control's text.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade aceita um LinkArea que define o local do hiperlink no texto do controle.

trans-unit.source: When a hyperlink is specified using the LinkArea property, the link area is then added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection> in the same manner as adding the link using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Quando um hiperlink é especificado usando a propriedade de LinkArea, a área de link é adicionada ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>da mesma maneira como adicionar o link usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A>método de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Length%2A> property specifies the number of characters within the text of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> to include in the link area.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Length%2A>propriedade especifica o número de caracteres dentro do texto do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>para incluir na área de link.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Length%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Start%2A> property specifies the first character in the control text to include in the hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Start%2A>propriedade especifica o primeiro caractere no texto do controle para incluir no hiperlink.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want to determine whether a specific LinkArea is empty, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.IsEmpty%2A> property instead of checking the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Length%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Se você quiser determinar se um LinkArea específico estiver vazia, você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.IsEmpty%2A>propriedade em vez de verificar os valores da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Start%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Length%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Length%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Start%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.IsEmpty%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based starting location of the link area within the text of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O local de início com base em zero da área dentro do texto de link a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The number of characters, after the starting character, to include in the link area.
trans-unit.target: O número de caracteres, após o caractere inicial, para incluir na área de link.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea"></xref> is equal to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Determina se este <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea"> </xref> é igual ao objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The object to compare to this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser comparado a este <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified object is equal to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o objeto especificado for igual ao atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o código hash para essa instância.

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer that is the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Um inteiro assinado de 32 bits que é o código hash para essa instância.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea"></xref> is empty.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea"> </xref> está vazio.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine whether a valid link area has been specified in this object instead of evaluating the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Length%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Start%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade para determinar se uma área de link válido foi especificada no objeto em vez de avaliar os valores de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Length%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Start%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Start%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Length%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified start and length return an empty link area; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o início especificada e o comprimento retornam uma área vazia do link; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of characters in the link area.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o número de caracteres na área de link.

trans-unit.source: To specify text from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> to display as a link, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Start%2A> property to the location in the text to start creating the link.
trans-unit.target: Para especificar o texto a partir de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>para exibir como um link, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Start%2A>propriedade para o local no texto para começar a criar o link.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Start%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Start%2A> property is set, set the value of the Length property to the number of characters, including the character position specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Start%2A> property, that you want to make the link text.
trans-unit.target: Após o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Start%2A>estiver definida, defina o valor da propriedade de comprimento para o número de caracteres, incluindo a posição do caractere especificada no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Start%2A>propriedade, o que você deseja tornar o texto do link.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Start%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to make the first word of the text "The quick brown fox" a link, you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Start%2A> property to zero (0) and the Length property to three (3).
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você quiser fazer um link para a primeira palavra do texto "A raposa marrom", defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Start%2A>propriedade como zero (0) e a propriedade de comprimento de três (3).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of characters, including spaces, in the link area.
trans-unit.target: O número de caracteres, incluindo espaços, na área de link.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether two instances of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea"></xref> class are equal.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se duas instâncias da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea"> </xref> classe são iguais.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea"> </xref> para comparar.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea"> </xref> para comparar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if two instances of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea"></xref> class are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se duas instâncias do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea"> </xref> classe forem iguais; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether two instances of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea"></xref> class are not equal.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se duas instâncias da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea"> </xref> classe não são iguais.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea"> </xref> para comparar.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea"> </xref> para comparar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if two instances of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea"></xref> class are not equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se duas instâncias do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea"> </xref> classe não forem iguais; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the starting location of the link area within the text of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o local inicial da área dentro do texto de link a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To specify text from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> to display as a link, set the Start property to the location in the text to start creating the link.
trans-unit.target: Para especificar o texto a partir de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>para exibir como um link, defina a propriedade de início para o local no texto para começar a criar o link.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>

trans-unit.source: After the Start property is set, set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Length%2A> property to the number of characters, including the character position specified in the Start property, that you want to make the link text.
trans-unit.target: Após definir a propriedade de início, defina o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Length%2A>propriedade para o número de caracteres, incluindo a posição do caractere especificado na propriedade de início, que você deseja tornar o texto do link.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Length%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to make the first word of the text "The quick brown fox" a link, you set the Start property to zero (0) and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Length%2A> property to three (3).
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você quiser fazer a primeira palavra do texto "A raposa marrom" um link, você definir a propriedade de início para zero (0) e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Length%2A>propriedade três (3).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Length%2A>

trans-unit.source: The location within the text of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel"></xref> control where the link starts.
trans-unit.target: O local dentro do texto do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel"> </xref> controle onde o link inicia.

trans-unit.source: Returns the fully qualified type name of this instance.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o nome de tipo totalmente qualificado desta instância.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing a fully qualified type name.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>que contém um nome de tipo totalmente qualificado.</xref:System.String>
